channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-5753|2024-09-16T22:24:53.960Z -- intel%20corporation -- most%20modern%20operating%20systems
item.description: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and branch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis.

item.title: CVE-2018-12201|2024-09-16T18:14:23.682Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20platform%20sample%20%2F%20silicon%20reference%20firmware
item.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in Platform Sample / Silicon Reference firmware for 8th Generation Intel(R) Core Processor, 7th Generation Intel(R) Core Processor, Intel(R) Pentium(R) Silver J5005 Processor, Intel(R) Pentium(R) Silver N5000 Processor, Intel(R) Celeron(R) J4105 Processor, Intel(R) Celeron(R) J4005 Processor, Intel Celeron(R) N4100 Processor and Intel(R) Celeron N4000 Processor may allow privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5691|2024-09-16T17:58:24.342Z -- intel%20corporation -- 6th%20and%207th%20generation%20intel%20core%20processor%20families%2C%20intel%20xeon%20e3-1500m%20v5%20and%20v6%20processor%20families%2C%20and%20intel%20xeon%20e3-1200%20v5%20and%20v6%20product%20families.
item.description: Incorrect check in Intel processors from 6th and 7th Generation Intel Core Processor Families, Intel Xeon E3-1500M v5 and v6 Product Families, and Intel Xeon E3-1200 v5 and v6 Product Families allows compromised system firmware to impact SGX security via incorrect early system state.

item.title: CVE-2018-3658|2024-09-16T22:35:54.845Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Multiple memory leaks in Intel AMT in Intel CSME firmware versions before 12.0.5 may allow an unauthenticated user with Intel AMT provisioned to potentially cause a partial denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3634|2024-09-16T20:42:00.326Z -- intel%20corporation -- online%20connect%20access
item.description: Parameter corruption in NDIS filter driver in Intel Online Connect Access 1.9.22.0 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12217|2024-09-16T18:59:36.980Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient access control in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables a privileged user to read device configuration information via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5711|2024-09-16T19:20:12.640Z -- intel%20corporation -- active%20management%20technology
item.description: Multiple buffer overflows in Active Management Technology (AMT) in Intel Manageability Engine Firmware 8.x/9.x/10.x/11.0/11.5/11.6/11.7/11.10/11.20 allow attacker with local access to the system to execute arbitrary code with AMT execution privilege.

item.title: CVE-2017-5738|2024-09-16T20:57:44.021Z -- intel%20corporation -- unite%20app
item.description: Escalation of privilege vulnerability in admin portal for Intel Unite App versions 3.1.32.12, 3.1.41.18 and 3.1.45.26 allows an attacker with network access to cause a denial of service and/or information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2018-12221|2024-09-16T16:32:35.551Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to cause an integer overflow via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3691|2024-09-16T20:01:38.691Z -- intel%20corporation -- integrated%20performance%20primitives%20cryptography%20library
item.description: Some implementations in Intel Integrated Performance Primitives Cryptography Library before version 2018 U3.1 do not properly ensure constant execution time.

item.title: CVE-2018-12224|2024-09-16T20:16:38.376Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Buffer leakage in igdkm64.sys in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3703|2024-09-16T16:28:06.609Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20ssd%20data%20center%20tool%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper directory permissions in the installer for the Intel(R) SSD Data Center Tool for Windows before v3.0.17 may allow authenticated users to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12205|2024-09-16T19:50:58.885Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20platform%20sample%20%2F%20silicon%20reference%20firmware
item.description: Improper certificate validation in Platform Sample/ Silicon Reference firmware for 8th Generation Intel(R) Core(tm) Processor, 7th Generation Intel(R) Core(tm) Processor may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via physical access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12168|2024-09-16T19:31:42.302Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20computing%20improvement%20program
item.description: Privilege escalation in file permissions in Intel Computing Improvement Program before version 2.2.0.03942 may allow an authenticated user to potentially execute code as administrator via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3649|2024-09-16T19:10:21.423Z -- intel%20corporation -- dual%20band%20wireless-ac%2C%20tri-band%20wireless-ac%20and%20wireless-ac%20family%20of%20products
item.description: DLL injection vulnerability in the installation executables (Autorun.exe and Setup.exe) for Intel's wireless drivers and related software in Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC, Tri-Band Wireless-AC and Wireless-AC family of products allows a local attacker to cause escalation of privilege via remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-3686|2024-09-16T20:46:59.139Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel-sa-00086%20detection%20tool
item.description: Code injection vulnerability in INTEL-SA-00086 Detection Tool before version 1.2.7.0 may allow a privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12220|2024-09-16T18:39:17.157Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Logic bug in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables a privileged user to execute arbitrary code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12211|2024-09-16T20:48:22.549Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient input validation in User Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to cause a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3624|2024-09-16T18:13:27.067Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20xmm71xx%2C%20intel%20xmm72xx%2C%20intel%20xmm73xx%2C%20intel%20xmm74xx%2C%20sofia%203g%2C%20sofia%203g-r%2C%20and%20sofia%203g-rw
item.description: Buffer overflow in ETWS processing module Intel XMM71xx, XMM72xx, XMM73xx, XMM74xx and Sofia 3G/R allows remote attacker to potentially execute arbitrary code via an adjacent network.

item.title: CVE-2018-3645|2024-09-16T16:52:56.704Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20remote%20keyboard
item.description: Escalation of privilege in all versions of the Intel Remote Keyboard allows a local attacker to inject keystrokes into another remote keyboard session.

item.title: CVE-2018-12177|2024-09-16T16:57:52.114Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20proset%2Fwireless%20wifi%20software
item.description: Improper directory permissions in the ZeroConfig service in Intel(R) PROSet/Wireless WiFi Software before version 20.90.0.7 may allow an authorized user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5698|2024-09-16T17:38:42.112Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20active%20management%20technology%2C%20intel%20standard%20manageability%2C%20and%20intel%20small%20business%20technology
item.description: Intel Active Management Technology, Intel Standard Manageability, and Intel Small Business Technology firmware versions 11.0.25.3001 and 11.0.26.3000 anti-rollback will not prevent upgrading to firmware version 11.6.x.1xxx which is vulnerable to CVE-2017-5689 and can be performed by a local user with administrative privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-12163|2024-09-16T17:19:16.000Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20iot%20developers%20kit
item.description: A DLL injection vulnerability in the Intel IoT Developers Kit 4.0 installer may allow an authenticated user to potentially escalate privileges using file modification via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5754|2024-09-16T16:48:54.618Z -- intel%20corporation -- most%20modern%20operating%20systems
item.description: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirect branch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis of the data cache.

item.title: CVE-2018-12192|2024-09-16T18:49:38.184Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Logic bug in Kernel subsystem in Intel CSME before version 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20, or Intel(R) Server Platform Services before version SPS_E5_04.00.04.393.0 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially bypass MEBx authentication via physical access.

item.title: CVE-2018-18098|2024-09-16T20:11:32.575Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20sgx%20sdk%20and%20platform%20software%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper file verification in install routine for Intel(R) SGX SDK and Platform Software for Windows before 2.2.100 may allow an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12222|2024-09-16T17:59:23.367Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to cause an out of bound memory read via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12154|2024-09-16T19:05:22.662Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Denial of Service in Unified Shader Compiler in Intel Graphics Drivers before 10.18.x.5056 (aka 15.33.x.5056), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057) and 20.19.x.5058 (aka 15.40.x.5058) may allow an unprivileged user to potentially create an infinite loop and crash an application via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3657|2024-09-16T20:01:21.908Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Multiple buffer overflows in Intel AMT in Intel CSME firmware versions before version 12.0.5 may allow a privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code with Intel AMT execution privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3616|2024-09-16T16:53:35.507Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Bleichenbacher-style side channel vulnerability in TLS implementation in Intel Active Management Technology before 12.0.5 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially obtain the TLS session key via the network.

item.title: CVE-2017-5717|2024-09-16T20:58:05.868Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Type Confusion in Content Protection HECI Service in Intel Graphics Driver allows unprivileged user to elevate privileges via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12151|2024-09-16T21:56:49.991Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20extreme%20tuning%20utility
item.description: Buffer overflow in installer for Intel Extreme Tuning Utility before 6.4.1.21 may allow an authenticated user to potentially cause a buffer overflow potentially leading to a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-3718|2024-09-16T19:30:40.223Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20nuc
item.description: Improper setting of device configuration in system firmware for Intel(R) NUC kits may allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via physical access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5710|2024-09-16T17:58:16.105Z -- intel%20corporation -- trusted%20execution%20engine
item.description: Multiple privilege escalations in kernel in Intel Trusted Execution Engine Firmware 3.0 allows unauthorized process to access privileged content via unspecified vector.

item.title: CVE-2018-12190|2024-09-16T17:54:51.459Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Intel(r) CSME subsystem before versions 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20 or Intel(r) TXE before 3.1.60 or 4.0.10 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-18089|2024-09-16T20:17:14.060Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Multiple out of bounds read in igdkm64.sys in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5699|2024-09-16T17:14:31.514Z -- intel%20corporation -- minnowboard%203
item.description: Input validation error in Intel MinnowBoard 3 Firmware versions prior to 0.65 allow local attacker to cause denial of service via UEFI APIs.

item.title: CVE-2017-5722|2024-09-16T22:35:55.343Z -- intel%20corporation -- nuc%20kits
item.description: Incorrect policy enforcement in system firmware for Intel NUC7i3BNK, NUC7i3BNH, NUC7i5BNK, NUC7i5BNH, NUC7i7BNH versions BN0049 and below allows attackers with local or physical access to bypass enforcement of integrity protections via manipulation of firmware storage.

item.title: CVE-2017-5696|2024-09-16T18:34:32.533Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Untrusted search path in Intel Graphics Driver 15.40.x.x, 15.45.x.x, and 21.20.x.x allows unprivileged user to elevate privileges via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12191|2024-09-16T22:09:10.253Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Bounds check in Kernel subsystem in Intel CSME before version 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20, or Intel(R) Server Platform Services before versions 4.00.04.383 or SPS 4.01.02.174, or Intel(R) TXE before versions 3.1.60 or 4.0.10 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially execute arbitrary code via physical access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12212|2024-09-16T22:15:46.154Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Buffer overflow in User Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to cause a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12203|2024-09-16T17:44:14.833Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20platform%20sample%20%2F%20silicon%20reference%20firmware
item.description: Denial of service vulnerability in Platform Sample/ Silicon Reference firmware for 8th Generation Intel Core Processor, 7th Generation Intel Core Processor may allow privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12176|2024-09-16T19:47:25.259Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20nuc%20kits%20and%20intel%28r%29%20compute%20cards
item.description: Improper input validation in firmware for Intel NUC Kits may allow a privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code resulting in information disclosure, escalation of privilege and/or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2019-0121|2024-09-16T20:26:24.356Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20matrix%20storage%20manager
item.description: Improper permissions in Intel(R) Matrix Storage Manager 8.9.0.1023 and before may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12198|2024-09-16T21:02:57.736Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Intel(R) Server Platform Services HECI subsystem before version SPS_E5_04.00.04.393.0 may allow privileged user to potentially cause a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12167|2024-09-16T22:56:24.155Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20optane%28tm%29%20ssd%20dc%20p4800x
item.description: Firmware update routine in bootloader for Intel(R) Optane(TM) SSD DC P4800X before version E2010435 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12214|2024-09-16T19:05:34.975Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Potential memory corruption in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables a privileged user to execute arbitrary code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12152|2024-09-16T16:58:35.199Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Pointer corruption in Unified Shader Compiler in Intel Graphics Drivers before 10.18.x.5056 (aka 15.33.x.5056), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057) and 20.19.x.5058 (aka 15.40.x.5058) may allow an unauthenticated remote user to potentially execute arbitrary WebGL code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12209|2024-09-16T16:58:34.678Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient access control in User Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to read device configuration information via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12213|2024-09-16T22:51:10.881Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Potential memory corruption in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to cause a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2017-5736|2024-09-16T23:01:10.992Z -- intel%20corporation -- software%20guard%20extensions%20platform%20software%20component
item.description: An elevation of privilege in Intel Software Guard Extensions Platform Software Component before 1.9.105.42329 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code as administrator.

item.title: CVE-2018-3669|2024-09-16T16:37:28.540Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20centrino%28r%29%20wireless-n%20and%20intel%28r%29%20centrino%28r%29%20advanced-n%20products%20bluetooth
item.description: A STOP error (BSoD) in the ibtfltcoex.sys driver for Intel Centrino Wireless N and Intel Centrino Advanced N adapters may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially send a malformed L2CAP Connection Request is sent to the Intel Bluetooth device via the network.

item.title: CVE-2017-5694|2024-09-16T17:03:34.241Z -- intel%20corporation -- solid-state%20drive%20professional
item.description: Data corruption vulnerability in firmware in Intel Solid-State Drive Professional PSF104P, PSF109P allows local users to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2019-0122|2024-09-16T18:49:09.236Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20software%20guard%20extensions%20sdk
item.description: Double free in Intel(R) SGX SDK for Linux before version 2.2 and Intel(R) SGX SDK for Windows before version 2.1 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3639|2024-09-16T22:55:27.557Z -- intel%20corporation -- multiple
item.description: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and speculative execution of memory reads before the addresses of all prior memory writes are known may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis, aka Speculative Store Bypass (SSB), Variant 4.

item.title: CVE-2018-3615|2024-09-16T19:40:45.253Z -- intel%20corporation -- multiple
item.description: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and Intel software guard extensions (Intel SGX) may allow unauthorized disclosure of information residing in the L1 data cache from an enclave to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis.

item.title: CVE-2018-12219|2024-09-16T16:53:11.371Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Kernel Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to read memory via local access via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12160|2024-09-16T19:15:39.667Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20data%20migration%20software
item.description: DLL injection vulnerability in software installer for Intel Data Center Migration Center Software v3.1 and before may allow an authenticated user to potentially execute code using default directory permissions via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12196|2024-09-16T17:04:17.378Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Intel(R) AMT in Intel(R) CSME before version 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20 may allow a privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12148|2024-09-16T20:57:30.293Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20driver%20%26%20support%20assistant
item.description: Privilege escalation in file permissions in Intel Driver and Support Assistant before 3.5.0.1 may allow an authenticated user to potentially execute code as administrator via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12149|2024-09-16T18:33:36.760Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20extreme%20tuning%20utility
item.description: Buffer overflow in input handling in Intel Extreme Tuning Utility before 6.4.1.21 may allow an authenticated user to potentially deny service to the application via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12172|2024-09-16T21:07:39.400Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20server%20board
item.description: Improper password hashing in firmware in Intel Server Board (S7200AP,S7200APR) and Intel Compute Module (HNS7200AP, HNS7200AP) may allow a privileged user to potentially disclose firmware passwords via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12185|2024-09-16T22:25:36.918Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Insufficient input validation in Intel(R) AMT in Intel(R) CSME before version 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially execute arbitrary code via physical access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12171|2024-09-16T20:02:17.695Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20baseboard%20management%20controller%20%28bmc%29%20firmware
item.description: Privilege escalation in Intel Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) firmware before version 1.43.91f76955 may allow an unprivileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code or perform denial of service over the network.

item.title: CVE-2018-12162|2024-09-16T22:36:33.658Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20openvino%28tm%29%20toolkit%20for%20windows
item.description: Directory permissions in the Intel OpenVINO Toolkit for Windows before version 2018.1.265 may allow an authenticated user to potentially execute code using default directory permissions via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12173|2024-09-16T16:18:34.131Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20server%20boards%20firmware
item.description: Insufficient access protection in firmware in Intel Server Board, Intel Server System and Intel Compute Module before firmware version 00.01.0014 may allow an unauthenticated attacker to potentially execute arbitrary code resulting in information disclosure, escalation of privilege and/or denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3640|2024-09-16T19:31:35.612Z -- intel%20corporation -- multiple
item.description: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and that perform speculative reads of system registers may allow unauthorized disclosure of system parameters to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis, aka Rogue System Register Read (RSRE), Variant 3a.

item.title: CVE-2018-3626|2024-09-16T20:17:30.591Z -- intel%20corporation -- sgx%20sdk
item.description: Edger8r tool in the Intel SGX SDK before version 2.1.2 (Linux) and 1.9.6 (Windows) may generate code that is susceptible to a side channel potentially allowing a local user to access unauthorized information.

item.title: CVE-2018-12189|2024-09-16T18:24:24.087Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20csme%2C%20server%20platform%20services%2C%20trusted%20execution%20engine%20and%20intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Unhandled exception in Content Protection subsystem in Intel CSME before versions 11.8.60, 11.11.60, 11.22.60 or 12.0.20 or Intel TXE before 3.1.60 or 4.0.10 may allow privileged user to potentially modify data via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12193|2024-09-16T20:47:56.153Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20quickassit%20technology%20for%20linux
item.description: Insufficient access control in driver stack for Intel QuickAssist Technology for Linux before version 4.2 may allow an unprivileged user to potentially disclose information via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12223|2024-09-16T17:42:42.851Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20graphics%20driver%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient access control in User Mode Driver in Intel(R) Graphics Driver for Windows* before versions 10.18.x.5059 (aka 15.33.x.5059), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057), 20.19.x.5063 (aka 15.40.x.5063) 21.20.x.5064 (aka 15.45.x.5064) and 24.20.100.6373 potentially enables an unprivileged user to escape from a virtual machine guest-to-host via local access.
